summary: In the world premiere of his Comedy Central one-hour stand-up special, "Beta Male," Kumail Nanjiani ("John Oliver's New York Stand-Up Show," "Portlandia," "Franklin & Bash") tells you about all the things that terrify him completely.
keywords: 1980s|new york|karachi|racism in video games|reference to world war two
title: Kumail Nanjiani: Beta Male
